unnormalised: The grand wedding of Priya and Rohan is all set to be the talk of the town! normalised: The grand wedding of Priya and Rohan is all set to be the talk of the town! unnormalised: But that’s not all folks! The wedding ceremony itself is reportedly planned at "The Leela Ambience Convention Hotel", 1 CBD, Maharaja Surajmal Road, Near Yamuna Sports Complex, Delhi, 110032, on 12/11/24. Getting there might be a bit of a hassle considering Delhi traffic, so guests are being advised to factor in at least 1 hour of travel time, especially coming from Gurgaon (122001)!

unnormalised: Invitations are already being sent out, so keep an eye on your mailboxes! RSVP by 01/11/2024 to avoid any last-minute confusion.
